title: suRxit — Health Risk Intelligence Platform
desc: Developed and deployed the core ML and data pipeline, standardizing clinical entities from raw documents and feeding the information into a Graph Neural Network (GNN) for risk prediction at scale. Contributed to the full product lifecycle, from high-fidelity data extraction (OCR/NER) to engineering the risk modeling and recommendation service powered by large language models (MedLM).

title: retort.ai — Browser Extension
desc: Built a lightweight Chrome/Edge extension that generates context-aware replies using OpenRouter and other LLM providers. Developed a modular React-based popup, background, and content scripts for text extraction and AI-powered response generation. Implemented tone control, message rewriting, and clipboard integration with secure API key management via chrome.storage.local.

title: GTU AI-powered PYQs Analyzer
desc: Developed an AI-powered Streamlit application for analyzing GTU Previous Year Question Papers (PYQs) to provide data-driven study recommendations. Implemented PDF parsing, NLP-based topic extraction, and semantic clustering (TF-IDF + K-Means) for question pattern and difficulty analysis. Integrated multiple LLMs via OpenRouter (GPT-4, Claude) to generate personalized study plans and comprehensive analysis reports.
